resources.string: Enable NFC, in addition to normal usage when the screen is on, when the:
phone is locked, but the screen is on
screen is off (regardless of lock state)
To have NFC behaviour return to the default (only enabled when the screen is on and the phone unlocked), either uninstall this mod or disable this module in Xposed Installer.
Play a sound when an NFC tag is lost
Notify applications when an NFC tag is lost
Change this value to reduce battery consumption when the device is kept on an NFC tag
Change the timeout of checking for an NFC tag when the device is placed on one. A higher value means lower battery consumption while the device is on the tag. Values in milliseconds (1s = 1000ms)
NFC tags that will unlock your device
The following NFC tags will unlock your device. Tap an NFC tag with your device to add it, long press an ID to delete it. NFC while screen off has to be enabled.
Requires Android 4.2, support for older versions coming soon
